task.title: Import Product Catalogs into Livefyre with AEM Commerce
task.shortdesc: Seamlessly integrate your existing product catalog into Livefyre to drive user engagement in Livefyre's visualization Apps.

context.p: After you import the product catalog, the products show up in real time in your Livefyre instance. If you edit or delete items in your AEM Commerce Product Catalog, the changes automatically update in Livefrye.

step.cmd: Ensure you have the latest Livefyre for AEM package installed on your AEM instance.
From the AEM homepage, navigate to AEM Commerce.
Create a new collection or use an existing collection.
Hover over the collection and click on Collection Properties (pencil icon).
Fill in Livefyre Page Prefix to link this collection to a specific page in AEM.
step.info: The page prefix defines the root path in your environment where searching for product pages begins. Livefyre chooses the first page that has a corresponding product associated to it. In order to get different pages for different products, multiple collections are needed.
